arts.ttl: Jonathan Burkardt brace secures Mainz victory over struggling Bochum
arts.sum: Burkardt, however, had already put the game beyond doubt when the striker was on hand to convert Mwene's low cross, notching his second of the match and a record 35th Bundesliga goal by a Mainz player. Jonathan Burkardt celebrates his second goal, which sealed Mainz's 2-0 victory over Bochum - IMAGO/Patrick Scheiber

arts.ttl: Maloney in negotiations to join Mainz on a free, Plettenberg reports
arts.sum: German transfer guru Florian Plettenberg reports that FSV Mainz 05 have won the race to sign Heidenheim midfielder Lennard Maloney.

arts.ttl: Lennard Maloney left out of the Heidenheim squad amid Mainz interest
arts.sum: According to Florian Plettenberg, Lennard Maloney will be left out of the Heidenheim squad for their match against Union Berlin this afternoon amid interest from fellow Bundesliga outfit Mainz. It…

arts.ttl: Bochum vs. Mainz 05 preview: Henriksen's side continue European qualification bid
arts.sum: Mainz 05 will continue their bid to secure European qualification when they travel to Vonovia-Ruhrstadion for Saturday's Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: It is set to be another busy week across the continent with action resuming in the Bundesliga and La Liga after the winter hiatus and Liam Flin has scanned the leagues to assemble a five-team acca for Saturday and Sunday.

arts.ttl: Five goalscorers to watch out for this weekend: Dembele to continue purple patch
arts.sum: Alex Wrigley has picked out five goalscorers to follow from across Europe over the coming days.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin appeals court ruling over Bochum goalkeeper hit by firelighter, warns of 'dirty tricks'
arts.sum: Union Berlin is appealing a decision by the German soccer federation’s sports court to award Bochum a 2-0 victory after Bochum’s goalkeeper was struck with a firelighter during their Bundesliga match in December. Earlier, the sports court had awarded Bochum a victory over Union instead of the 1-1 draw that the teams played out on Dec. 14.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. VfL Bochum - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and VfL Bochum, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Bochum awarded second Bundesliga win after goalie struck by firelighter
arts.sum: This led to a weakening of the Bochum team, which was caused by a Berlin spectator and, according to the federation’s legal and procedural rules, is therefore attributable to Union Berlin.” “The ruling contradicts our legal opinion that the match ended properly with a sporting result of 1-1 according to the referee’s decision,” Union spokesman Christian Arbeit said.

arts.ttl: DFB rules in favour of Bochum win following match-interrupted draw at Union Berlin
arts.sum: Bochum officially lodged an appeal against the result of their 1-1 draw at Union on 14 December 2024 after goalkeeper Patrick Drewes was hit by a lighter thrown from the crowd, leading to a lengthy delay in proceedings. The DFB (German Football Association) has awarded Bochum three points following the club's appeal against a match-interrupted draw at Union Berlin on Matchday 14.
